questions.question: 单数：baby
questions.explanation: baby以辅音+y结尾，改y为i加es，复数为babies

questions.question: 单数：city
questions.explanation: city以辅音+y结尾，改y为i加es，复数为cities

questions.question: 单数：boy
questions.explanation: boy以元音+y结尾，直接加s，复数为boys

questions.question: 单数：story
questions.explanation: story以辅音+y结尾，改y为i加es，复数为stories

questions.question: I have three ______.
questions.explanation: three提示复数，key以元音+y结尾，直接加s变为keys

questions.question: There are many ______ in the garden.
questions.explanation: many提示复数，lady以辅音+y结尾，改y为i加es变为ladies

questions.question: 单数：toy
questions.explanation: toy以元音+y结尾，直接加s，复数为toys

questions.question: She reads many ______ every month.
questions.explanation: many提示复数，diary以辅音+y结尾，改y为i加es变为diaries

questions.question: 单数：day
questions.explanation: day以元音+y结尾，直接加s，复数为days

questions.question: The ______ are very busy.
questions.explanation: are提示复数，family以辅音+y结尾，改y为i加es变为families

questions.question: 单数：butterfly
questions.explanation: butterfly以辅音+y结尾，改y为i加es，复数为butterflies

questions.question: 单数：monkey
questions.explanation: monkey以元音+y结尾，直接加s，复数为monkeys

questions.question: She has many ______.
questions.explanation: many提示复数，hobby以辅音+y结尾，改y为i加es变为hobbies

questions.question: 单数：country
questions.explanation: country以辅音+y结尾，改y为i加es，复数为countries

questions.question: 单数：valley
questions.explanation: valley以元音+y结尾，直接加s，复数为valleys

questions.question: There are many ______ in the library.
questions.explanation: many提示复数，dictionary以辅音+y结尾，改y为i加es变为dictionaries

questions.question: 单数：party
questions.explanation: party以辅音+y结尾，改y为i加es，复数为parties

questions.question: 单数：donkey
questions.explanation: donkey以元音+y结尾，直接加s，复数为donkeys

questions.question: I like ______.
questions.explanation: 根据语境应填复数，strawberry以辅音+y结尾，改y为i加es变为strawberries

questions.question: 单数：library
questions.explanation: library以辅音+y结尾，改y为i加es，复数为libraries

questions.question: 单数：highway
questions.explanation: highway以元音+y结尾，直接加s，复数为highways

questions.question: 单数：box
questions.explanation: 干扰题！box以x结尾，加es，不是y结尾

questions.question: 单数：dog
questions.explanation: 干扰题！dog直接加s，不是y结尾

questions.question: This is a ______.
questions.explanation: 陷阱题！is a表示单数，应填单数形式baby

questions.question: There are many ______.
questions.explanation: 干扰题！watch以ch结尾加es，不是y结尾
